programme.title: Ali & Nino
programme.desc: Premiere. In the early part of the 20th century, a young Azerbaijani nobleman falls for a Georgian princess. Romantic drama, starring Adam Bakri, Maria Valverde and Mandy Patinkin. Directed by Asif Kapadia, maker of the Oscar-winning Amy.

programme.title: Couples Vacation
programme.desc: Premiere. A couple hope to rekindle their marriage by heading to a Texas glamping retreat. Romantic comedy, starring David Arquette, Amy Acker and Adan Canto.

programme.title: Journey to Oz
programme.desc: Premiere. The cunning Urfin wants to become ruler of Magic Land. With an army of wooden soldiers, he captures the Emerald City, but the arrival of Dorothy, the tin man and lion looks like scuppering his plans. Animated adventure, with the voice of Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld.

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: A hard-working construction worker is forced to deal with life-shattering loss when his family are killed in a plane crash. Drama, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Scoot McNairy and Maggie Grace.

programme.title: To Sir, with Love
programme.desc: A black engineer takes a teaching job at a tough London school to make ends meet, and over the course of his difficult first term, struggles to gain the respect of his disruptive pupils. Drama, starring Sidney Poitier, Christian Roberts, Judy Geeson, Geoffrey Bayldon, Patricia Routledge, Christopher Chittell and Lulu.

programme.title: An Affair to Remember
programme.desc: Love blossoms on the high seas for a playboy bachelor and a former nightclub singer during a transatlantic cruise. When the liner comes into dock at New York, they agree to wait for six months and then meet again at the Empire State Building, hoping to prove to each other their relationship is more than a shipboard affair. Romantic drama, with Cary Grant, Deborah Kerr, Cathleen Nesbitt, Richard Denning and Neva Patterson.

programme.title: Manhattan Night
programme.desc: Porter Wren, a columnist and crime reporter for a New York City newspaper, is convinced by the alluring Caroline Crowley to investigate her film director husband's death. Thriller, starring Adrien Brody, Yvonne Strahovski and Jennifer Beals.

programme.title: Blind
programme.desc: A blind novelist begins a passionate affair with the neglected wife of a corrupt businessman. Romantic drama, starring Alec Baldwin, Demi Moore and Dylan McDermott.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: A trio of African-American women attempt to overcome prejudice as they work on the US space programme. Biopic, starring Taraji P Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monae and Kevin Costner.

programme.title: Victoria & Abdul
programme.desc: Queen Victoria strikes up an unlikely friendship with a young Indian clerk named Abdul Karim. Stephen Frears drama, starring Judi Dench, Ali Fazal and Tim Pigott-Smith.

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Five teenagers who occupy different areas of their school's social structure are thrown together for a Saturday morning detention. During the day, they analyse their behaviour and find unexpected common ground. Drama, directed by John Hughes and starring Emilio Estevez, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald, Anthony Michael Hall, Ally Sheedy and Paul Gleason.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: A trio of African-American women attempt to overcome prejudice as they work on the US space programme. Biopic, starring Taraji P Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monae and Kevin Costner.

programme.title: Victoria & Abdul

programme.title: The Breakfast Club

Drama, directed by John Hughes and starring Emilio Estevez, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald, Anthony Michael Hall, Ally Sheedy and Paul Gleason.

programme.title: Men of Honor
programme.desc: A US Navy recruit resolves to overcome racism and become the service's first black diver. However, his superior officers are determined to see him fail, and when he loses a leg, his goal seems impossible - until he receives help from an unexpected source. Fact-based drama, starring Cuba Gooding Jr, Robert De Niro, Charlize Theron and Hal Holbrook.

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: A recently released ex-convict becomes involved with a woman married to an abusive husband. Drama, starring Elisabeth Moss, Waleed Zuaiter and Octavia Spencer.

programme.title: Queen Of Katwe
programme.desc: The life of a poor Ugandan youngster is changed forever when she is introduced to the game of chess. Drama, starring David Oyelowo, Lupita Nyong'o and Madina Nalwanga.

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: The manager of a struggling baseball team faces disaster, as his star players are bought out by richer clubs and he is unable to afford to replace them. An economics student offers him a solution to his problems, finding a ground-breaking way to analyse the performance of cheaper players and combining their abilities to form a winning side. Fact-based drama, starring Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Which movies are doing the best business at home and across the pond? Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
programme.desc: The owner of an ailing golf club aims to raise money by drafting in a former golfing great and holding a high-stakes game. Unfortunately, the player soon realises his form is not what it was - but a mysterious caddy is on hand to dispense words of wisdom and common sense. Robert Redford's drama, starring Matt Damon, Will Smith and Charlize Theron.

programme.title: The Girl in the Book
programme.desc: A junior editor must confront difficult memories when she crosses paths with the writer who took advantage of her as a teenager. Drama, starring Emily VanCamp and Michael Nyqvist.

programme.title: Julie & Julia
programme.desc: Biopic telling the stories of revolutionary 1960s American chef Julia Child and modern-day housewife Julie Powell, who vows to master her heroine's most famous recipes in one year and maintain a blog about her experiences. Starring Meryl Streep, Amy Adams, Stanley Tucci, Chris Messina, Linda Emond and Helen Carey.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German Army, and wait for evacuation during a fierce battle in the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's drama, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy and Mark Rylance.

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: When a New York executive tips into depression, his scheming partners plan to use his letters to Love, Time and Death against him. Fantasy drama, with Will Smith, Edward Norton and Helen Mirren.

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: A reclusive genius creates a boy but dies before completing him, leaving his brainchild with scissor-like blades in place of hands. A kindly woman from a nearby suburb takes pity on the lonely figure and welcomes him into her home. He quickly becomes a hit in the neighbourhood - but then his new friends start to turn against him. Tim Burton's fantasy, starring Johnny Depp, Winona Ryder, Dianne Wiest and Vincent Price.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German Army, and wait for evacuation during a fierce battle in the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's drama, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy and Mark Rylance.

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Biopic of country singer Johnny Cash. Traumatised by the death of his brother as a child and scorned by his father, Cash leaves Arkansas to serve in the US Air Force in Germany, where he starts to write songs. Although reaching a high point in his career touring alongside Elvis and Jerry Lee Lewis, he descends into drink and drug addiction, while fellow singer and future wife June Carter seems to be the only person standing between him and self-destruction. With Joaquin Phoenix and an Oscar-winning Reese Witherspoon.

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: Single man Frank Adler attempts to raise his child prodigy niece, Mary. However, his plans for a normal school life for the youngster are foiled when the youngster's mathematical abilities come to the attention of Frank's formidable mother, Evelyn. Drama, starring Chris Evans, Lindsay Duncan and Mckenna Grace.(n)

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: In the late 1960s, jazz musician Chet Baker battles drug addiction and struggles to launch a comeback. Drama, starring Ethan Hawke, Carmen Ejogo and Callum Keith Rennie.(n)

programme.title: Zorba the Greek
programme.desc: A timid English writer arrives in Crete to open a mine for the family business and falls under the spell of a local peasant with a charismatic and inspiring zest for life. Drama, starring Anthony Quinn, Alan Bates, Irene Papas, Lila Kedrova and Sotiris Moustakas.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Which movies are doing the best business at home and across the pond? Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: The Phantom of the Opera
programme.desc: A disfigured composer lurks in the catacombs beneath a Paris opera house, giving rise to stories that the building is haunted. The lonely maestro becomes infatuated with a talented young singer, and plans to turn her into a star. However, his love for her is doomed to end in tragedy. Adaptation of Andrew Lloyd Webber's musical, starring Gerard Butler, Emmy Rossum, Miranda Richardson and Minnie Driver.(n)

programme.title: One Last Score
programme.desc: A young, recently-released and unpredictable ex-con with bad luck, and a listless girl-next-door with a troubled family, become trapped in a downward spiral of crime and obsessive love, as they try to ditch their dead-end town for a better life. Crime drama, starring Riley Keough, Chris Zylka and Faith Hill.(n)

programme.title: The Birth of a Nation
programme.desc: Biopic of Nat Turner, the literate plantation preacher who led a slave rebellion in 1831 Virginia, starring Nate Parker, Armie Hammer and Penelope Ann Miller.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Which movies are doing the best business at home and across the pond? Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: A London neurosurgeon desperate to attend an operation crosses paths with an American bride determined to get to her wedding. When their chartered flight crashes, they attempt to survive in the wilderness, while fighting their attraction to each other. Romantic adventure, starring Idris Elba, Kate Winslet and Beau Bridges.(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A manager for an American courier service has to fend for himself when a plane crash leaves him stranded alone on a desert island. Initially panic-stricken, he overcomes his terror to survive for four years on his own before building a raft and setting off on an epic journey back home. Adventure drama, starring Tom Hanks, Helen Hunt, Nick Searcy, Lari White and Chris Noth.(n)

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A Warsaw animal lover risks her life by helping to shield hundreds of Jews from the Nazis. True-life drama, starring Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: A London neurosurgeon desperate to attend an operation crosses paths with an American bride determined to get to her wedding. When their chartered flight crashes, they attempt to survive in the wilderness, while fighting their attraction to each other. Romantic adventure, starring Idris Elba, Kate Winslet and Beau Bridges.(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A manager for an American courier service has to fend for himself when a plane crash leaves him stranded alone on a desert island. Initially panic-stricken, he overcomes his terror to survive for four years on his own before building a raft and setting off on an epic journey back home. Adventure drama, starring Tom Hanks, Helen Hunt, Nick Searcy, Lari White and Chris Noth.(n)

programme.title: Dazed and Confused
programme.desc: The students of a Texas high-school enjoy the last day of term in 1976, spending their time in pursuit of sex, drink or drugs. Meanwhile, the newly arrived freshmen are put through a series of humiliating initiation pranks. Richard Linklater's comedy drama, starring Ben Affleck, Milla Jovovich, Matthew McConaughey and Parker Posey.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: A second-rate ice-hockey player with a thuggish temperament discovers he has a powerful golf swing. He decides to enters a prestigious tournament to raise enough money to save his debt-ridden grandmother's house from falling into the hands of tax inspectors. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Carl Weathers, Julie Bowen and Frances Bay.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
programme.desc: A family gather to bury the patriarch, but any dignity to the occasion soon disappears in a run of disasters. The deceased's oldest son resents the success of his younger brother, while their sister's boyfriend has accidentally taken LSD and an unexpected guest has a few shock revelations to make. Comedy, with Chris Rock, Martin Lawrence, Zoe Saldana and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: Police Academy 7: Mission to Moscow
programme.desc: Commandant Lassard sends the incompetent cops to Russia to help their counterparts capture an elusive criminal mastermind who uses his genius with computers to pull off a series of daring robberies. Comedy sequel, starring George Gaynes, Michael Winslow, David Graf, Leslie Easterbrook and Christopher Lee.

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: A bigoted misanthropic writer, who treats everyone he meets with contempt, is forced to look after a gay neighbour's dog, and develops an empathy with another creature for the first time in years. Sensing a need for human company, he pursues an unlikely romance with a waitress, who is the only person willing to put up with his rudeness. Romantic comedy drama, with Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Cuba Gooding Jr and Greg Kinnear.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie Hart is taken off active duty and made the face of the bureau's publicity campaign, but would rather catch crooks than be the focus of media attention - so when her friends are kidnapped, she disobeys orders to run her own undercover investigation with the help of a short-tempered colleague. Comedy sequel, starring Sandra Bullock, Regina King, William Shatner and Heather Burns.

programme.title: Chokeslam
programme.desc: A deli clerk attempts to win back his estranged fiancee a decade after he humiliated her. She's now a professional wrestler about to retire, so he arranges one last match. Comedy, starring Chris Marquette, Amanda Crew, Niall Matter and Michael Eklund.

programme.title: The Dictator
programme.desc: The tyrannical ruler of a North African nation travels to New York to address the United Nations, but he ends up stranded in America after a failed assassination attempt masterminded by his brother. He accepts the hospitality of a human rights activist unaware of his identity as he plots his return to power. Comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Anna Faris and Ben Kingsley.

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Four teenage boys make a solemn pact to lose their virginity before the high-school prom, and though their antics cause them huge embarrassment and public humiliation, the friends also learn about love and affection in their relations with the opposite sex. Coming-of-age comedy, starring Jason Biggs, Shannon Elizabeth, Chris Klein, Alyson Hannigan, Mena Suvari, Seann William Scott and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: A mild-mannered English teacher is challenged to an after-school scuffle by a fellow faculty member. Comedy, starring Charlie Day, Ice Cube and Tracy Morgan.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the Thames, hapless champagne-swigging friends Patsy and Edina are hounded by the paparazzi. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha.

programme.title: The Dictator
programme.desc: The tyrannical ruler of a North African nation travels to New York to address the United Nations, but he ends up stranded in America after a failed assassination attempt masterminded by his brother. He accepts the hospitality of a human rights activist unaware of his identity as he plots his return to power. Comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Anna Faris and Ben Kingsley.

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Four teenage boys make a solemn pact to lose their virginity before the high-school prom, and though their antics cause them huge embarrassment and public humiliation, the friends also learn about love and affection in their relations with the opposite sex. Coming-of-age comedy, starring Jason Biggs, Shannon Elizabeth, Chris Klein, Alyson Hannigan, Mena Suvari, Seann William Scott and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: A mild-mannered English teacher is challenged to an after-school scuffle by a fellow faculty member. Comedy, starring Charlie Day, Ice Cube and Tracy Morgan.

programme.title: Year One
programme.desc: An inept hunter and his shy gatherer sidekick are kicked out of their tribe and left to wander the Old Testament world. Blundering through several key moments of the Bible, they eventually end up at Sodom, where they must try and rescue their people from slavery. Comedy, starring Jack Black, Michael Cera, Oliver Platt and Hank Azaria.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his gang of daredevil friends bring the MTV series to the big screen. As usual, they perform a variety of weird and wonderful stunts, including crawling across dozens of mousetraps while wearing rodent make-up, and being rolled down bowling lanes on skateboards. Comedy, with Bam Margera, Henry Rollins, Spike Jonze and Tony Hawk.

programme.title: Clue
programme.desc: Six strangers who are all being blackmailed are summoned to a remote mansion run by a bizarre butler, to meet the man who knows their secrets. When the blackmailer subsequently turns up dead, the guests must uncover which of them is the guilty party - or if someone else is in the house. Comedy, based on the board game Cluedo, starring Tim Curry, Madeline Kahn, Christopher Lloyd, Lesley Ann Warren and Michael McKean.

programme.title: Killing Hasselhoff
programme.desc: A debt-ridden nightclub owner decides to rig his celebrity death pool, which means killing his pick - the star of Knight Rider and Baywatch. Comedy, starring Ken Jeong, Jim Jefferies and David Hasselhoff.

programme.title: Patch Adams
programme.desc: A talented student doctor turns the medical community upside down with his offbeat views about the healing power of laughter. His methods provoke outrage and intense debate among his professors - but his extrovert nature brightens the lives of all kinds of patients. Comedy drama, starring Robin Williams, Monica Potter, Daniel London, Bob Gunton and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: Don't Think Twice
programme.desc: Turmoil strikes a New York improv troupe when one member leaves to star in a Saturday Night Live-style TV show. Comedy, starring Keegan-Michael Key and Gillian Jacobs.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Two irresponsible salesmen find themselves in trouble with the law after crashing their truck. To avoid jail, they agree to undertake community service looking after a couple of troubled kids. However, it soon seems that going to prison would have been the easier option. Comedy, starring Paul Rudd, Seann William Scott and Christopher Mintz-Plasse.

programme.title: Bruce Almighty
programme.desc: God tires of a down-on-his-luck reporter's constant complaining, so passes on His powers to give him a taste of ultimate responsibility. The newsman falls in love with his extraordinary abilities - but a never-ending stream of incoming prayers and his ambitious attempt to please everyone soon prove there is more to the job than meets the eye. Comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jennifer Aniston and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: The teenagers reunite after their first year at college to spend the summer at a lake house. Jim is concerned by his lack of sexual experience, and goes in search of an old flame, Oz struggles to keep a long-term relationship going, and Finch tries to master the art of tantric sex. Comedy sequel, starring Jason Biggs, Chris Klein, Seann William Scott, Alyson Hannigan and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine.

programme.title: Bruce Almighty
programme.desc: God tires of a down-on-his-luck reporter's constant complaining, so passes on His powers to give him a taste of ultimate responsibility. The newsman falls in love with his extraordinary abilities - but a never-ending stream of incoming prayers and his ambitious attempt to please everyone soon prove there is more to the job than meets the eye. Comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jennifer Aniston and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Two irresponsible salesmen find themselves in trouble with the law after crashing their truck. To avoid jail, they agree to undertake community service looking after a couple of troubled kids. However, it soon seems that going to prison would have been the easier option. Comedy, starring Paul Rudd, Seann William Scott and Christopher Mintz-Plasse.

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: The teenagers reunite after their first year at college to spend the summer at a lake house. Jim is concerned by his lack of sexual experience, and goes in search of an old flame, Oz struggles to keep a long-term relationship going, and Finch tries to master the art of tantric sex. Comedy sequel, starring Jason Biggs, Chris Klein, Seann William Scott, Alyson Hannigan and Eugene Levy.

programme.title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
programme.desc: Israeli Special Agent Zohan Dvir grows tired of his dangerous life and longs for a change of scene. While in the process of capturing an enemy activist, Zohan fakes his own death and moves to New York to begin a new life as a hair stylist. He is forced to use his combat training once more to defend his neighbourhood from a crooked landlord and his thugs. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, John Turturro and Emmanuelle Chriqui.

programme.title: Ali G Indahouse
programme.desc: Scheming politicians try to manipulate the unwitting Ali G into bringing about the downfall of the prime minister - but fail to appreciate that his streetwise attitude could give the government much-needed street cred. Comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Michael Gambon, Charles Dance, Kellie Bright, Martin Freeman and Rhona Mitra.(n)

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Another batch of outrageous stunts is lined up by the death-defying friends, who get chased by bulls, used as human shark bait, have leeches attached to their eyes and ride a giant rocket. Comedy sequel, starring Johnny Knoxville, Bam Margera, Steve-O, Chris Pontius and Ryan Dunn.(n)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
programme.desc: A thoroughly ordinary man is hurled into an intergalactic adventure when Earth is destroyed to make way for a hyperspace bypass. Luckily, his friend, who turns out to be an alien, gives him a handy travel guide to help him make sense of the universe. Sci-fi comedy based on Douglas Adams' classic series, with Martin Freeman, Bill Nighy, Mos Def, Zooey Deschanel and Sam Rockwell. Stephen Fry is the guide's narrator.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Which movies are doing the best business at home and across the pond? Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
programme.desc: The heroic outlaw returns from the Crusades to discover the country is in the grip of evil Prince John and the Sheriff of Rottingham, so he unites a motley band of warriors to overthrow them. Mel Brooks comedy, starring Cary Elwes, Roger Rees, Richard Lewis, Tracey Ullman, Amy Yasbeck, Patrick Stewart, Isaac Hayes and Dom DeLuise.(n)

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: A baseball player is stunned to learn he has come into a massive inheritance. Unfortunately, there is one condition - he must somehow find a way to spend $30million in just one month, or he will lose the lot. Meanwhile, two scheming lawyers, who stand to get the money if he fails, are determined to sabotage his efforts. Comedy, starring Richard Pryor, John Candy, Lonette McKee and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Which movies are doing the best business at home and across the pond? Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: This Is the End
programme.desc: A group of movie stars gathers in Hollywood for a glamorous housewarming party, only to be faced with the Biblical apocalypse. As demons overrun the world, the celebrities go into hiding, and must rise above their own selfishness if they are to survive. Fantasy comedy, starring James Franco, Jonah Hill, Emma Watson, Michael Cera and co-director Seth Rogen as themselves.(n)

programme.title: Jack and Jill
programme.desc: A successful advertising executive dreads the annual visit from his annoying twin sister, who this time refuses to leave. He fears she will ruin his chances of persuading Al Pacino to appear in a commercial, only for the Hollywood star to become smitten with the unwanted guest. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler in a dual role, with Katie Holmes and Pacino as himself.(n)

programme.title: American Pie: The Wedding
programme.desc: The friends from East Great Falls High reunite to celebrate Jim and Michelle's forthcoming wedding. Though reluctant to invite Stifler to their big day, the happy couple relent - but regret their decision when he plans a bachelor party on the same evening Jim is due to meet the in-laws. The third instalment in the comedy series, with Jason Biggs, Alyson Hannigan, Seann William Scott, Eddie Kaye Thomas and Eugene Levy.(n)

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: A man suffering a midlife crisis tries to recapture his lost youth by going back to his old haunts with two equally unhappy friends and his teenage nephew. They end up being transported back to 1986 and are tempted to give themselves the lives they always wanted - despite warnings that they must not change anything. Sci-fi comedy, starring John Cusack, Clark Duke, Craig Robinson and Rob Corddry.(n)

programme.title: Jack and Jill

They end up being transported back to 1986 and are tempted to give themselves the lives they always wanted - despite warnings that they must not change anything. Sci-fi comedy, starring John Cusack, Clark Duke, Craig Robinson and Rob Corddry.(n)

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: A reconnaissance pilot is shot down and becomes stranded in enemy territory after filming evidence of a genocidal massacre by Serb militia in Bosnia. The naval air commander for Nato forces in the Balkans defies orders by mounting an unauthorised mission to rescue him, while the airman faces a battle to stay alive as he is pursued by paramilitary forces. Bosnian War drama, starring Gene Hackman, Owen Wilson, Gabriel Macht and Olek Krupa.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Film-makers venture deep into the Amazon jungle to document the lives of a remote tribe. However, the expedition is hijacked by a crazed hunter who plans to use them as bait to catch a gigantic killer snake. Adventure, starring Jennifer Lopez, Jon Voight, Ice Cube, Eric Stoltz and Jonathan Hyde.

programme.title: All About the Money
programme.desc: Two friends are convinced by another to take a holiday in South America, and then discover they are there to capture the US's most wanted criminal - with no military training. Adventure, starring Eddie Griffin, Blake Freeman and Casper Van Dien.

programme.title: Anon: Special
programme.desc: A feature on the sci-fi thriller starring Clive Owen.

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: The daughter of a respected actor becomes bored with her high society lifestyle and trains to become a bounty hunter. However, the thrills of her new occupation, coupled with the presence of television cameras recording her exploits for a reality TV show, soon send her life spiralling out of control. Thriller, starring Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke and Jacqueline Bisset.

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The American president is forced to take drastic measures to save his family when their plane is hijacked by Russian terrorists demanding the release of a jailed radical general. Meanwhile, the vice president tries to manage the crisis from Washington and has to decide whether to shoot the aircraft down. Action thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Gary Oldman, Glenn Close, Dean Stockwell and William H Macy.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2
programme.desc: The team of intergalactic outlaws must fight to stay together as they unravel the mystery surrounding Peter Quill's father. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana and Kurt Russell, with the voices of Bradley Cooper and Vin Diesel.

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok
programme.desc: The warrior is imprisoned on the other side of the universe and attempts to get back to Asgard to stop the destruction of his homeworld by his evil sister. However, while fighting as a gladiator for a crazed dictator, Thor finds help from an unexpected source. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Cate Blanchett, Tom Hiddleston and Mark Ruffalo.

programme.title: Air Force One

programme.title: Cyborg
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic warrior risks his life to protect a female android who holds the key to curing a man-made plague devastating humanity. However, a host of bloodthirsty warriors are determined to stop them getting to the scientists who need the information. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dayle Haddon, Deborah Richter and Vincent Klyn.

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: Undead warrior Selene fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her. Action-horror, starring Kate Beckinsale, Theo James and Charles Dance.

programme.title: Death Warrant
programme.desc: A maverick Canadian Mountie poses as a convict to smash a sinister plot involving the sale of human organs, only to find himself facing a desperate fight for survival. Thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Robert Guillaume and Cynthia Gibb.

programme.title: Anon: Special
programme.desc: A feature on the sci-fi thriller starring Clive Owen.

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: Four soldiers are sent on a top-secret mission in Iraq that results in them being imprisoned for a crime they did not commit. When they learn the culprit is trying to sell equipment for producing fake currency, they break out of prison to find both him and evidence of their innocence. Action adventure based on the 1980s TV series, with Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley and Quinton `Rampage' Jackson.

programme.title: Anon: Special
programme.desc: A feature on the sci-fi thriller starring Clive Owen.

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: A woman is sent to a psychiatric hospital by her abusive stepfather, and is due to be lobotomised in five days. She retreats into her imagination, seeing herself and her fellow inmates as warriors in a twisted dream world who must overcome a series of challenges to win their freedom. Fantasy adventure, with Emily Browning, Abbie Cornish and Jena Malone.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: Deadly ghost scavengers, led by Captain Salazar, escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea, including Captain Jack Sparrow. Swashbuckling sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Javier Bardem and Geoffrey Rush.

programme.title: White House Down
programme.desc: A policeman is turned down for his dream job as a secret service bodyguard to the president. While taking his daughter on a tour of the White House, he gets the chance to prove himself when terrorists seize control of the building, putting the head of state's life in his hands. Action thriller, with Channing Tatum, Jamie Foxx, Maggie Gyllenhaal and James Woods.

programme.title: Anon: Special
programme.desc: A feature on the sci-fi thriller starring Clive Owen.

Action thriller, with Channing Tatum, Jamie Foxx, Maggie Gyllenhaal and James Woods.

programme.title: Death Wish
programme.desc: A family man takes the law into his own hands when his wife is murdered and his daughter is left psychologically traumatised by thugs. Setting out on a one-man crusade to rid the streets of crime, he becomes a hero to the people - and a thorn in the side of the authorities. Vigilante thriller, starring Charles Bronson, Hope Lange and Vincent Gardenia.(n)

programme.title: Marked for Death
programme.desc: A former narcotics agent decides it is time to retire and settle down after his partner is killed. However, his peaceful retirement comes to an abrupt end when a villainous drug dealer known as Screwface tries to kill his sister and her daughter. The enraged operative pursues the crime lord to Jamaica in search of vengeance. Action thriller, starring Steven Seagal, Basil Wallace and Joanna Pacula.(n)

programme.title: Jarhead 3: The Siege
programme.desc: A group of US marines are called into action when heavily armed militants launch a surprise attack on an embassy in the Middle East. Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins.(n)

programme.title: Anon: Special
programme.desc: A feature on the sci-fi thriller starring Clive Owen.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: A Saxon nobleman is declared an outlaw for protecting a poacher from a cruel Norman knight. Hiding out in a forest, he recruits a group of bandits and leads them in a campaign against the corrupt Norman aristocracy, while also fighting to save his friend's niece from being forced into marriage. Adventure, starring Patrick Bergin and Uma Thurman.(n)

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: An arrogant racing driver is determined to seize the reigning Nascar champion's crown, winning the Indianapolis 500 in the process. However, his first few races see him intimidated by the surroundings and unable to finish due to crashes or blown engines. A serious accident compounds his misfortunes and jeopardises his chances of ever racing again. Drama, starring Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Robert Duvall, Randy Quaid and John C Reilly.(n)

programme.title: Goal! The Dream Begins
programme.desc: A Mexican living in Los Angeles dreams of becoming a professional footballer - and his wish seems to come true when a talent scout offers him the chance to play for Newcastle United. Unfortunately, the pressures of the Premier League and adapting to a new life in Britain prove harder than expected. Drama, starring Kuno Becker and Anna Friel. David Beckham, Alan Shearer and Zinedine Zidane make cameo appearances.(n)

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: MI6 operative Lorraine Broughton is sent to Berlin before the fall of the wall to investigate the murder of a fellow spy and recover a missing list of double agents. Thriller, starring Charlize Theron, James McAvoy and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: A US Air Force veteran ejects his co-pilot from their Stealth bomber in a plan to steal the plane's cargo of nuclear warheads. He uses the weapons to extort money from the American government by threatening to detonate one in a major city. Action thriller, starring John Travolta, Christian Slater, Samantha Mathis and Delroy Lindo.(n)

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: An arrogant racing driver is determined to seize the reigning Nascar champion's crown, winning the Indianapolis 500 in the process. However, his first few races see him intimidated by the surroundings and unable to finish due to crashes or blown engines. A serious accident compounds his misfortunes and jeopardises his chances of ever racing again. Drama, starring Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Robert Duvall, Randy Quaid and John C Reilly.(n)

programme.title: Goal! The Dream Begins
programme.desc: A Mexican living in Los Angeles dreams of becoming a professional footballer - and his wish seems to come true when a talent scout offers him the chance to play for Newcastle United. Unfortunately, the pressures of the Premier League and adapting to a new life in Britain prove harder than expected. Drama, starring Kuno Becker and Anna Friel. David Beckham, Alan Shearer and Zinedine Zidane make cameo appearances.(n)

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: MI6 operative Lorraine Broughton is sent to Berlin before the fall of the wall to investigate the murder of a fellow spy and recover a missing list of double agents. Thriller, starring Charlize Theron, James McAvoy and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: A Mexican cop-turned-mercenary is hired by a shadowy businessman to assassinate a politician. When he realises his employers have double-crossed him, he joins forces with a band of militant illegal immigrants to seek a suitably bloody revenge. Action thriller, starring Danny Trejo, Robert De Niro and Jessica Alba.(n)

programme.title: The Childhood of a Leader
programme.desc: Ignored by his distant, disciplinarian parents, youngster Prescott develops into an ego-driven brat whose behaviour becomes increasingly unsettling. Psychological drama, starring Berenice Bejo, Liam Cunningham, Stacy Martin and Tom Sweet.

programme.title: The Birth of a Nation
programme.desc: Biopic of Nat Turner, the literate plantation preacher who led a slave rebellion in 1831 Virginia, starring Nate Parker, Armie Hammer and Penelope Ann Miller.

programme.title: The Measure of a Man
programme.desc: An unemployed man struggles to support his wife and son on meagre state benefits, while contending with pointless and humiliating bureaucracy as she searches for a job. He is eventually employed as a firm's head of security, only to discover his new position confronts him with a terrible moral dilemma. Drama, starring Vincent Lindon and Karine de Mirbeck. In French.

programme.title: I Won't Come Back
programme.desc: A student on the run from the police decides to hit the road with a young orphan determined to track down the only family she has left. Russian drama, starring Polina Pushkaruk, Vika Lobachova and Andrey Astrakhantsev.

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
programme.desc: A 19-year-old private is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle, as flashbacks show what really happened to his squad - contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions. Drama, starring Joe Alwyn, Garrett Hedlund and Arturo Castro.

programme.title: Brothers in Arms
programme.desc: A group of Turkish special forces soldiers set out on a dangerous mission to rescue a journalist from Islamic State militants. In Turkish. War drama, starring Ozan Agac, Bedii Akin and Murat Arkin.

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Victorian stage illusionists Robert Angier and Alfred Borden engage in a bitter personal and professional rivalry. The pair resort to increasingly brutal measures to sabotage each other's acts, while Angier becomes obsessed with the secret behind Borden's greatest illusion. Christopher Nolan's mystery thriller, starring Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Piper Perabo and Scarlett Johansson, with David Bowie as real-life scientific pioneer Nikola Tesla.

programme.title: Five Easy Pieces
programme.desc: An oil-rigger who has cut himself off from his cultured, middle-class roots reluctantly returns to his family home, with his pregnant girlfriend in tow, after receiving word that his father is dying. However, the homecoming turns into a failure, as the psychological journey has a lasting impact on himself and those closest to him. Drama, with Jack Nicholson, Karen Black, Susan Anspach and Ralph Waite.

programme.title: Solaris
programme.desc: A psychiatrist arrives on a space station to investigate the death of its commanding officer but subsequently starts to experience frightening visions of his late wife - which seem all too real and force him to question his sanity. Sci-fi drama, directed by Steven Soderbergh and based on Stanislaw Lem's novel, starring George Clooney, Natascha McElhone, Viola Davis, Jeremy Davies and Ulrich Tukur.

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: A laconic gunslinger, a ruthless hired killer and a conniving outlaw hunt for a cache of loot during the chaos of the American Civil War. However, each is privy to only part of the information necessary to find it, setting in motion a series of deadly betrayals. The third film in Sergio Leone's Spaghetti Western trilogy, starring Clint Eastwood as the Man with No Name, with Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach. With a soundtrack by Ennio Morricone.

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: A British diplomat in Kenya takes charge of the investigation into the murder of his wife, who had published an article highly critical of the money-making collusion between the High Commission and a pharmaceutical manufacturer. Fernando Meirelles' political thriller, based on John le Carre's novel, with Ralph Fiennes, Rachel Weisz, Danny Huston and Bill Nighy.

programme.title: Fashionista
programme.desc: A woman who uses clothes as an emotional crutch discovers her life isn't as ideal as she thought. Thriller, starring Amanda Fuller, Ethan Embry and Eric Balfour.

programme.title: Viking
programme.desc: Forced to flee his homeland by his treacherous half-brother, a Viking prince attempts to build an army and reclaim the throne. Drama, starring Anton Adasinsky, Aleksandr Armer and Vilen Babichev. In Russian.

programme.title: An
programme.desc: A pancake stall manager is confronted with an odd but sympathetic elderly woman looking for work. Before long she changes his life. Drama, starring Kirin Kiki, Masatoshi Nagase and Kyara Uchida. In Japanese.

programme.title: Flirting With Love
programme.desc: Constant distractions hamper a pair of struggling New York actors who retreat to the country to work on a script. Comedy, starring Marisa Tomei, Sam Rockwell and Ivan Martin.

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: More than 400 Korean workers risk their lives to escape from a forced labour camp on the island of Hashima in southern Japan. Period drama, starring Jung-min Hwang, Ji-seob So and Joong-Ki Song.

programme.title: Winchester '73
programme.desc: A gunslinger tracks down his father's killer, but is unable to exact his revenge because the sheriff of the town makes a point of confiscating all firearms. Instead he challenges him to compete in a shooting competition to win a superb rifle, but when the murderer loses, he steals the coveted prize. Western, starring James Stewart, Shelley Winters, Dan Duryea and Stephen McNally.

programme.title: Office Space
programme.desc: A jaded computer programmer goes to bizarre lengths to get fired from his dull job - but his new laid-back attitude leads to unexpected promotions as his arrogance is taken for supreme self-confidence by unwitting bosses. Satirical comedy, starring Ron Livingston, Jennifer Aniston, Ajay Naidu and Gary Cole.

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: A bored millionaire masterminds a bank robbery, only to find himself pursued by a glamorous insurance investigator determined to prove his guilt. It is not long before they get embroiled in a passionate affair - but conflicting interests mean they can never really trust one another. Crime drama, starring Steve McQueen, Faye Dunaway, Paul Burke and Yaphet Kotto.

programme.title: Call Me by Your Name
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Elio begins a relationship with Oliver, his father's research assistant in northern Italy. Oscar and Bafta-winning romantic drama, starring Armie Hammer, Timothee Chalamet and Michael Stuhlbarg.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: An American cargo ship sets a dangerous course around the coast of Somalia, while inland, four men are pressed into service as pirates by the local warlords. The captain is taken hostage when the raiding party hijacks the vessel, resulting in a tense five-day crisis. Fact-based thriller, starring Tom Hanks and Barkhad Abdi.

programme.title: Call Me by Your Name
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Elio begins a relationship with Oliver, his father's research assistant in northern Italy. Oscar and Bafta-winning romantic drama, starring Armie Hammer, Timothee Chalamet and Michael Stuhlbarg.

programme.title: Ingrid Goes West
programme.desc: An unbalanced social media stalker moves to Los Angeles and worms herself into the life of an Instagram star. Comedy drama, starring Aubrey Plaza and Elizabeth Olsen.(n)

programme.title: Shin Godzilla
programme.desc: Japan is plunged into chaos upon the appearance of a giant monster. Fantasy adventure, starring Hiroki Hasegawa, Yutaka Takenouchi and Satomi Ishihara.(n)

programme.title: Most Beautiful Island
programme.desc: A young Spanish woman struggles for survival in America as she finds redemption from a tortured past. Thriller, directed by and starring Ana Asensio, with Natasha Romanova and David Little.(n)

programme.title: The Desert Rats
programme.desc: A Scottish army officer is placed in command of a unit of Australian troops given the task of defending Tobruk against overwhelming German forces, led by the renowned general Rommel. Second World War adventure, starring Richard Burton, Robert Newton and James Mason, reprising his role as Rommel from The Desert Fox.(n)

programme.title: The Housemaid
programme.desc: A vengeful spirit stirs when the owner of a crumbling rubber plantation embarks on a forbidden affair with his young housemaid. Horror, starring Kate Nhung, Jean-Michel Richaud and Kim Xuan. In Vietnamese.(n)

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon.(n)

programme.title: GI Blues
programme.desc: A guitar-strumming soldier bets he can win the hardened heart of an unresponsive West German cabaret dancer. She rejects him when she learns about the wager, but by then he has already genuinely fallen in love with her. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, Juliet Prowse, James Douglas and Robert Ivers. Songs include Blue Suede Shoes, Tonight Is So Right For Love and the title number.(n)

programme.title: Blue Hawaii
programme.desc: A Honolulu resident returns home after two years in the army and defies his parents' wish that he work in the family pineapple business. He has set his heart on carving his own niche and makes a start by taking a job at a tourist agency. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, Angela Lansbury, Joan Blackman and Roland Winters. Songs featured include Can't Help Falling in Love and Rock-a-Hula Baby.(n)

programme.title: Fun in Acapulco
programme.desc: A former trapeze artist tries to put a work-related tragedy behind him by taking a job as a lifeguard and entertainer in a luxury hotel at the Mexican resort. He ends up contending with the considerable wiles of his beautiful boss and a female matador who each have romantic designs on him. Musical comedy, starring Elvis Presley, Ursula Andress, Paul Lukas and Alejandro Rey.(n)

programme.title: Roustabout
programme.desc: A leather-clad drifter with a talent for all things tuneful joins a travelling carnival, and catches the eye of a co-worker - but her father is less less than keen on the relationship, leading to trouble. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, Barbara Stanwyck, Joan Freeman, Leif Erickson and Sue Ann Langdon.(n)

programme.title: Paradise, Hawaiian Style
programme.desc: A reckless singing pilot joins a friend in Hawaii, where they plan to go into business together running chartered helicopter flights. However, his irresponsible nature, tangled love life and dangerous flying threaten to ruin their enterprise. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, James Shigeta and Suzanna Leigh.(n)

programme.title: Crazy Heart
programme.desc: Washed-up country music star Bad Blake is heading for an early grave thanks to his alcoholic, chain-smoking lifestyle on the road. However, when he rides up to play a gig in Santa Fe, he encounters a journalist and single mother whose affection grants him a new lease of life. Drama, starring an Oscar-winning Jeff Bridges, alongside Maggie Gyllenhaal, Colin Farrell and Jack Nation.(n)

programme.title: Almost Famous
programme.desc: A teenage journalist is hired to write about a rock band and joins the group on tour, to the horror of his doting mother. While struggling to meet his deadline, he falls under the spell of the charismatic lead guitarist and a free-spirited groupie - but the youngster is forced to grow up fast before the manic world of rock 'n' roll overwhelms him. 1970s-set comedy drama, with Patrick Fugit, Billy Crudup, Kate Hudson and Frances McDormand.(n)

programme.title: Mulan II
programme.desc: The warrior heroine is assigned as a bodyguard to three princesses by the emperor of China. When she learns the girls are to be forced into marriage, she decides to help them escape - jeopardising her relationship with her fiance, who remains loyal to the emperor. Disney animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Ming-Na and Lucy Liu.

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure
programme.desc: The fairy and her friends work together to restore the source of their magical power and ensure the world's supply of pixie dust does not run out. However, when Tinker Bell accidentally jeopardises their plans, she must go on a dangerous quest to find a way of putting things right. Animated adventure, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Anjelica Huston, Lucy Liu and Jane Horrocks.

programme.title: Fantasia 2000
programme.desc: Animated family comedy. A continuation of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: A professor invents a ray with the power to reduce objects in size. Unfortunately, his kids and their meddling friends activate it and are shrunk to microscopic proportions. When they are accidentally thrown out with the rubbish, the children have to contend with all kinds of animals and insects on their journey home across the backyard. Disney comedy, with Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman and Amy O'Neill.

programme.title: Winnie the Pooh: Springtime with Roo
programme.desc: The gang's Easter celebrations come under threat when Rabbit grumpily refuses to join in, preferring to spend the day spring cleaning. Roo comes up with a plan to cheer him up and remind him that he used to love the holiday. Animated adventure, narrated by David Ogden Stiers and featuring the voices of Jim Cummings, Ken Sansom and Jimmy Bennett.

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Woody, Buzz and the other toys accidently end up in a daycare centre when their owner grows up. At first this seems like the perfect new home for them, but when they realise the dangers lurking under the surface, they begin to formulate an escape plan. Pixar animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Michael Keaton and Ned Beatty.

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Overworked estate agent Jim Evers takes his beleaguered family to look round an isolated, crumbling mansion - but the resident ghosts are not especially pleased to see the visitors. Comedy based on the Disney theme-park ride, starring Eddie Murphy, Terence Stamp, Jennifer Tilly and Marsha Thomason.

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Ben Gates sets out to clear the family name when evidence emerges that an ancestor was involved in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln. His mission leads him on another globe-trotting treasure hunt that uncovers a secret conspiracy. Adventure sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Helen Mirren, Ed Harris, Harvey Keitel and Jon Voight.

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: A group of lemurs finds a dinosaur egg, and when it hatches, brings the baby lizard up. When a meteor strike destroys their territory, the reptile and his mammal family must go in search of a new home, a quest that leads to dangerous encounters with other creatures. Animated adventure, with the voices of DB Sweeney, Julianna Margulies and Joan Plowright.

programme.title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
programme.desc: Anthology of animated tales based on AA Milne's stories, following a series of exploits of the dim-witted bear and his collection of unusual friends. With the voices of Sterling Holloway, Paul Winchell, Sebastian Cabot and Junius Matthews.

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Woody, Buzz and the other toys accidently end up in a daycare centre when their owner grows up. At first this seems like the perfect new home for them, but when they realise the dangers lurking under the surface, they begin to formulate an escape plan. Pixar animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Michael Keaton and Ned Beatty.

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Ben Gates sets out to clear the family name when evidence emerges that an ancestor was involved in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln. His mission leads him on another globe-trotting treasure hunt that uncovers a secret conspiracy. Adventure sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Helen Mirren, Ed Harris, Harvey Keitel and Jon Voight.

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Overworked estate agent Jim Evers takes his beleaguered family to look round an isolated, crumbling mansion - but the resident ghosts are not especially pleased to see the visitors. Comedy based on the Disney theme-park ride, starring Eddie Murphy, Terence Stamp, Jennifer Tilly and Marsha Thomason.

programme.title: Disney's Blank Cheque
programme.desc: Convicted bank-robber Carl Quigley plots to exchange $1,000,000 in stolen bills by coercing a bank's president into swapping the notes for legal tender. As he tries to escape the scene of his plot, Quigley runs over 11-year-old Preston Waters' bicycle, and in his haste to get away, offers the boy a blank cheque as compensation. However, Quigley fails to anticipate tech-savvy Preston exploiting the gesture to help himself to the criminal's million-dollar fortune, then embarking a dream spending spree. Family comedy, starring Brian Bonsall and Miguel Ferrer.

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: A New York teenager moves with her parents to a small town, where she quickly gets drawn into a bitter conflict with a local girl - until auditions for a musical give her the chance to outshine her rival. Meanwhile, she faces the challenge of working out how to get back to the big city for her favourite band's farewell concert. Drama, starring Lindsay Lohan, Adam Garcia, Glenne Headly and Alison Pill.

programme.title: The Great Muppet Caper
programme.desc: Reporters Kermit the Frog and Fozzie Bear are sacked for missing out on a massive scoop about the theft of jewellery from famous British fashion designer Lady Holiday. To try to re-establish their reputations, the duo and Gonzo fly to London to see if they can track down the culprit. Comedy, with the voices of Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with cameo appearances by John Cleese, Diana Rigg, Charles Grodin and Peter Ustinov.

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke.

programme.title: Disney's Blank Cheque
programme.desc: Convicted bank-robber Carl Quigley plots to exchange $1,000,000 in stolen bills by coercing a bank's president into swapping the notes for legal tender. As he tries to escape the scene of his plot, Quigley runs over 11-year-old Preston Waters' bicycle, and in his haste to get away, offers the boy a blank cheque as compensation. However, Quigley fails to anticipate tech-savvy Preston exploiting the gesture to help himself to the criminal's million-dollar fortune, then embarking a dream spending spree. Family comedy, starring Brian Bonsall and Miguel Ferrer.

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: A street urchin is caught up in a scheming grand vizier's plot to get his clutches on a magical lamp. Retrieving the object from a wondrous cave, he releases a powerful genie trapped inside, whose ability to grant wishes helps the young hero thwart the villain's plans and woo a princess. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger and Linda Larkin.

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: Constantly outshined and outraced by a fleet of hi-tech rookies, former champ Lightning McQueen must find a new way to win. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Owen Wilson, Cristela Alonzo and Chris Cooper.

programme.title: Piper
programme.desc: Animated Pixar short, directed by Alan Barillaro. A mother bird tries to teach her little one how to find food for herself, but encounters a traumatic experience.

programme.title: Toy Story
programme.desc: A jealous string-pulled cowboy doll's status as his owner's favourite plaything is threatened by the arrival of a charismatic hi-tech astronaut figure, who refuses to believe he is simply a toy. However, the rivals are forced to work together when they are left stranded in the outside world. Pixar animated adventure, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles and Jim Varney.

programme.title: Heavyweights
programme.desc: Shy, overweight kids look forward to their annual holiday together, an occasion which gives them the chance to really enjoy themselves. However, they are shocked to learn their summer camp has been taken over by a fanatical fitness trainer determined to knock them into shape by fair means or foul. Family comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Aaron Schwartz, Shaun Weiss and Tom Hodges.

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the frog is persuaded by his agent that he has a future in movies. He sets off on a journey across America to realise his dream, gathering a crowd of like-minded friends along the way - but the owner of a French restaurant plans to make him the dish of the day. Comedy, starring Dom DeLuise and Charles Durning alongside the puppet characters, with cameos from Mel Brooks, Orson Welles and Steve Martin.

programme.title: Lou
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated Pixar animation about a pile of lost and found items coming together to teach a toy-stealing schoolyard bully a valuable lesson.

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: A street urchin is caught up in a scheming grand vizier's plot to get his clutches on a magical lamp. However, the rivals are forced to work together when they are left stranded in the outside world. Pixar animated adventure, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles and Jim Varney.

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: Cowboy doll Woody is stolen by an unscrupulous toy collector, who knows he is worth a fortune as a collectible, prompting fearless Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear to lead a daring across-town mission to rescue him. However, Woody is tempted to spend his life languishing in the safety of a museum rather than face the prospect of his owner growing up. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the frog is persuaded by his agent that he has a future in movies. Comedy, starring Dom DeLuise and Charles Durning alongside the puppet characters, with cameos from Mel Brooks, Orson Welles and Steve Martin.

programme.title: The News Boys
programme.desc: Newspaper delivery boys in 19th-century New York rely on their meagre earnings to support their impoverished families. When media mogul Joseph Pulitzer raises his prices, threatening the livelihoods of the youngsters, they organise into a union to force him to put people's lives ahead of his own profits. Fact-based musical, starring Robert Duvall, Christian Bale and Ann-Margret.

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: With the help of a magical dragon, a lonely orphan boy escapes from a life of servitude with the cruel Gogan family. He makes a fresh start in a seaside town, befriending a lighthouse keeper and her father, but the Gogans are soon on his trail, while a phoney doctor wants the dragon for his travelling show. Part-animated musical fantasy, starring Jim Dale, Sean Marshall, Helen Reddy, Mickey Rooney and Shelley Winters.(n)

programme.title: Atlantis 2: Milo's Return
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel in which the intrepid scientist - reunited with his old friends - investigates a series of strange events around the world. However, his exploration leads him into a confrontation with a fearsome sea monster. With the voices of James Arnold Taylor and Cree Summer.(n)

programme.title: Brother Bear
programme.desc: A Native American boy plots revenge when his father is killed by a bear that was protecting its young. However, upon entering the forest he is magically transformed into a cub and soon learns a lesson about nature's relationship with man. Animated adventure, with the voices of Joaquin Phoenix, Rick Moranis and Dave Thomas.(n)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Wicked fashion designer Cruella De Vil steals a huge litter of newborn Dalmatian puppies to turn into a magnificent coat - but the lucky pups have many four-legged friends who are determined the evil woman and her cronies will get their just deserts. Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.(n)

programme.desc: A battle-hardened military veteran fails to protect a government scientist from assassins. He is assigned to safeguard the dead boffin's family in case the killers come after the top-secret technology in his home, but finds looking after kids proves far tougher than taking on hitmen. Family comedy, starring Vin Diesel and Lauren Graham.(n)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions
programme.desc: The stakes have rarely been higher and the rivalries never as fierce as Yugi Muto and rival Seto Kaiba return for an epic battle. Animated adventure, with the voices of Dan Green, Eric Stuart and Wayne Grayson.

programme.title: The Ant Bully
programme.desc: A friendless, moody 10-year-old spends his free time terrorising ants - until the tiny creatures take their revenge by magically reducing him to their own size and forcing him to learn how to contribute to colony life. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep and Paul Giamatti.

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: A prince and princess have been expected to marry each other all their lives, a prospect they dreaded as children but which they came to look forward to as adults. However, an evil wizard captures the princess and turns her into a swan. Everyone else believes she is dead, but her betrothed sets out to bring her home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Jack Palance and John Cleese.

programme.title: The Land Before Time
programme.desc: A young brontosaurus is left alone when his mother dies, so goes off in search of a legendary valley, where food is plentiful and he will be safe. He acquires a group of new friends on his journey, who help each other to avoid predators and obstacles in their way. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Gabriel Damon and Pat Hingle.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sends Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty on a quest into the Forbidden Forest. Animated adventure, with the voices of Demi Lovato and Julia Roberts.

programme.title: Monsters University
programme.desc: Student creatures Mike and Sulley attend university to learn how to be scary, but their rivalry gets them both kicked off the course. The monstrous duo must learn how to work together if they are to realise their dreams of terrifying children. Animated comedy prequel, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal and Helen Mirren.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Derek's anniversary celebrations are thwarted by an evil sorcerer searching for a magical orb hidden deep inside their castle. When Derek is lured out of the palace to rescue his kidnapped mother, Odette calls on her band of animal friends for help. Animated fantasy sequel, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Douglas Sills, Jake Williamson and Christy Landers.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Hero of the Year
programme.desc: Wonder Woman, Supergirl, Batgirl and Bumblebee team up to try to stop Dark Opal, who targets the heroes and steals some of their most valued possessions to form the ultimate weapon. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Grey Griffin and Sean Schemmel.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his town's weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan.

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sends Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty on a quest into the Forbidden Forest. Animated adventure, with the voices of Demi Lovato and Julia Roberts.

programme.title: Thumbelina
programme.desc: A girl the size of her mother's thumb leads a lonely life, until she falls in love with the similarly tiny prince of the fairies. However, their romance is cut short when she is kidnapped by a family of toads and faces a perilous journey through a forest to return home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Gary Imhoff and John Hurt.

programme.title: Blinky Bill: The Movie
programme.desc: A koala embarks on an epic adventure to find his missing father, teaming up with some pals and venturing into the dangerous Outback. Animated adventure, with the voices of Billy Birmingham, Toni Collette and Charlotte Rose Hamlyn.

programme.title: The Dragon Spell
programme.desc: A young boy embarks on a quest to save the world of humans and the world of magic, with the aid of an aspiring wizard and feral wild child. Animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Viktor Andrienko, Kate Bristol and Allen Enlow.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Hero of the Year
programme.desc: Wonder Woman, Supergirl, Batgirl and Bumblebee team up to try to stop Dark Opal, who targets the heroes and steals some of their most valued possessions to form the ultimate weapon. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Grey Griffin and Sean Schemmel.

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown.

programme.title: Super Furry Animals
programme.desc: Chaos erupts when a cowardly critter uses an untested scientific contraption and accidentally swaps bodies with a caterpillar. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Vinnie Penna, Peter Linz, Mike Pollock and Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld.

programme.title: DC Superhero Girls: Intergalactic Games
programme.desc: Wonder Woman, Supergirl, Batgirl, Poison Ivy, Harley Quinn, Bumblebee and Katana go up against Korugar Academy in a friendly competition that aims to bring peace throughout the galaxy. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voice of Grey Griffin.

programme.title: Kubo and the Two Strings
programme.desc: A young boy embarks on an epic quest when he inadvertently summons vengeful spirits from his past. Bafta-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson and Matthew McConaughey.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of children's books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke.

programme.title: The Nut Job 2: Nutty By Nature
programme.desc: Surly the squirrel must save the day when a property-developing mayor threatens his city park home. Animated sequel, with the voices of Will Arnett and Jackie Chan.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: The adventures of the legendary outlaw and Sherwood Forest's band of heroes as they rob the rich to feed the poor, while evil Prince John hatches a cunning plan to exact revenge and finish off the brigands. Disney animation, with the voices of Terry-Thomas, Peter Ustinov, Phil Harris, Brian Bedford and Monica Evans.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell.

programme.title: Rabbit School: Guardians Of The Golden Egg
programme.desc: When the Easter rabbit school comes under threat from a family of foxes plotting to steal the legendary golden egg, it's up to young Max to save the day. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Noah Levi and Senta Berger.(n)

programme.title: Louis And Luca And The Snow Machine
programme.desc: Things quickly get out of hand when a powerful snow machine is stolen by an ambitious newspaper editor hungry for a story. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Hugh Bonneville.(n)

programme.title: Louis & Luca: The Big Cheese Race
programme.desc: A friendly cheese race becomes a high-stakes dash to the finish after magpie Louis risks his friend's workshop with a secret bet. Animation, with the voices of John F Brungot, Anders Bye and Frimand Plosen.(n)

programme.title: The Aristocats
programme.desc: A jealous butler is outraged when his employer leaves a vast fortune to her cat and kittens instead of to him, so he drives the pets to the French countryside and dumps them. However, a streetwise alley cat steps in to help the pampered felines find their way home and claim their rightful inheritance. Animated Disney adventure, with the voices of Eva Gabor, Phil Harris and Scatman Crothers.(n)

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.(n)

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: A pair of elementary school pranksters inadvertently transform their mean-spirited principal into a daring vigilante. Cartoon adventure, with the voices of Kevin Hart, Thomas Middleditch and Ed Helms.(n)

programme.title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
programme.desc: Disney animated version of the Brothers Grimm story about a princess driven from her home into a sinister forest by her evil stepmother. She is taken in by a group of kindly dwarf miners, but her happiness is threatened when her stepmother returns bearing a poisoned apple. The first ever feature length animated movie, with the voices of Adriana Caselotti and Lucille La Verne.(n)

programme.title: Dr Seuss' The Lorax
programme.desc: A boy leaves his urban home in search of a real tree, and meets the reclusive industrialist who first created the city. The hermit tells the story of a grumpy forest creature who tried to stop him destroying the trees, and inspires the youngster to undo the damage that has been done. Animated fantasy based on the children's book, with the voices of Danny DeVito, Zac Efron and Ed Helms.(n)

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.(n)
